title: "Too many e-mails" error with TB 115, Mail Merge 10.3.0
content:
Win 10 Pro, Thunderbird 115.5.0, Mail Merge 10.3.0

smtp.comcast.net, Port 465, Normal password, SSL/TLS

Have been using Mail Merge for several years. Comcast e-mail send quota is 1000 messages/day. Mail Merge had been working well with occasional batches of 900+ messages.

Since updating to Thunderbird 115, Thunderbird stops sending e-mails after approximately 11 e-mails. Messages 5-9 kb each, no attachments. Screen shot of error message attached.

Thunderbird will resume sending if I exit Thunderbird, wait for cache to empty, restart Thunderbird WITHOUT the "ask to send unsent e-mails" activated, then use the "Send Unsent E-mails" menu item.

Do you have any idea what may be happening?
creator: jrweiss98020

title: Thunderbird - New Tag not working after deleting a tag and adding a new one.
content:
I deleted a tag and then added a new one (Settings/Tags/New...). It ended up inserting the new tag in the position of the deleted tag (ie. the new tag shows up in place 4, where the deleted tag was, don't know if that's relevant).

The new tag does not work. Whenever I use that tag it shows up and then disappears. Any ideas how I can fix this? Would deleting all the tags and starting again help or make things worse? I've seen similar threads here but they've been archived so I'm starting a new one.
creator: ruthe1

title: Outlook Icons
content: I just installed Thunderbird 115.5.0 on Debian 12 KDE Plasma desktop, for some reason the icon for Thunderbird is the MS outlook icon. Any one else have this problem.
creator: 1170jfm

title: Moving inbox emails to their own folders has changed for the worse
content: All my emails come to an Inbox in Thunderbird. When I choose one to move to a separate folder to keep, the inbox contents flips to some point that I don't require, and I then have to scroll through to the point where I took the email I was storing again, often hard to determine. It is random , and if the email I want to shift is on the current day, it seems to behave, but when I choose to move one from a few days ago, it is hopeless. It is time consuming, and annoying, and I can't see the point of it. Why is this happening, and how can I fix it please? It usually flips back to a point earlier than the date I am working on. Weird, and has only done this since one of your last updates, and always stable in the past....For a new addition to the program it is so inefficient. Thank you
creator: Greencon

title: restoring backup files to Thunderbird
content: My computer got a new hard drive and I am trying to restore Thunderbird backed up files. The backed up files are now back on my PC. I looked at the support guide and can find the files on my new hard drive using the Profile folder in the troubleshooting information but I don't know how to get Thunderbird to use them. I now have Windows 11 if that matters. Thanks for your assistance. Kathy

title: Cannot send a POP3 Earthlink.net email message.
content: Cannot send a POP3 Earthlink.net email message. Send error occurs: Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because the connection to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtpauth.earthlink.net timed out. Try again
creator: panafrique

title: Font size/formatting bug/issue only when replying to one specific recipient
content:
After the last couple of Thunderbird updates, I have been experiencing a really frustrating issue that I can't seem to resolve.

Only when I receive emails from one specific recipient and I go to reply to them, the font size is suddenly really large, and the spacing between new lines is huge.

Even if I set the font options to the same as if I was replying to a different recipient or creating a new message, it still appears really large.

What's worse is even if I make all these adjustments and get the font size and formatting looking okay, the actual sent message is even more out of whack and has all these spacing problems.

Does anyone know what might be going on? No other mail client I use experiences this issue whatsoever, and this issue is only occuring with this recipient.
creator: kylegp

title: Help to gain back my lost message in Box......................
content: recently my email through Thunderbird/modzilla quit working......Mainly i do not receive new e mails....I can send a new message and see the sent file but cannot receive a view incoming e mails How can this be fixed?? Most apprecialed Ron Butterworth aman@trytel.net

title: ho un problema
content: Premetto che non sono un grosso conoscitore di programmi ed avendo acquistato un nuovo PC volevo installare da solo THUNDERBIRD trasferendo tutti i dati che avevo accumulato nelle CARTELLE LOCALI ( circa una ventina) dal vecchio PC. E' stato un grande errore perchè non solo ho mancato il trasferimento, ma ho perso tutti i contenuti delle cartelle o forse sono finite da qualche parte e non riesco più a trovarle. Chiedo pertanto un grosso aiuto per ritrovarle visto che sono un grosso archivio dei miei lavori.Grazie

title: Crazy autocorrect behaviour on MAC version
content:
HI

I use Thunderbird on 2 platforms: PC and MAC.

Both are updated to the latest version.

The MAc version have an annoying problem:

It autocorrect almost all words in a crazy manner: 1. It capitalise letters middle of the sentence. 2. It doubles letters 3. It adds space between the first letter of an word and the next word it glue it to the previous word.

I am placing here an example: WE Aare P artof EU

instead of 

We are part of EU.

This happens only in Thunderbird so it is not a platform problem. I unchecked the autospelling and autocorrect but this behaviour still happen. Only on MAC. In the same time on PC platform I don't have this problem.

What can be done?
creator: office717

title: Disattivazione reindirizzamento automatico verso altra casella di posta
content: Salve, diversi anni fa scelsi di reindirizzare tutte le email inviate alla mia casella di lavoro Thunderbird verso la mia casella di posta privata Yahoo. Ora questa necessità è venuta meno e voglio disattivare tale reindirizzamento automatico ma non trovo più il relativo comando. Chiedo cortesemente il vostro aiuto. Grazie infinite S. M.

title: Some types of emails not appearing in Thunderbird
content: I have recently switched to Thunderbird from Outlook and have found that some types of email are not reaching my Thunderbird inbox. I can see them in my email provider's webmail and they worked fine in Outlook but they aren't appearing in Thunderbird. I have tried adding the sender's email to my address book and telling Thunderbird not to block messages if the sender is in my address book but that hasn't helped. The two types that I have noticed are: i) messages from a groups.io mailing list that I'm a member of and ii) the daily digest from Nextdoor (a local social media website). Any suggestions gratefully received.

title: Suddenly cannot send mail from Thunderbird
content:
I use Thunderbird mail-client to acces my outlook.dk - account. It has run perfect for a period, but suddenly I cannot send e-mails !!

The error-txt is (translated from my danish version): Sending the message failed. The message could not be sent because the connection to the SMTP server smtp.office365.com timed out. Try again.

I expected that that a password should be entered before sending - but no ..... - only a long waiting periode and then the error-txt

Server-settings in Thunderbird are: IMAP-server: outlook.office365.com, IMAP port 993, IMAP-crypt.: TLS SMPT-server: smtp.office365.com, SMTP port 587, SMTP-crypt. STARTTLS, Auth: General password

This has troubled me for some time - help needed, thanks.
creator: erlingagesen

title: Consume 100% CPU and GUI freeze
content:
Hi all!

Few days ago Thunderbird start consume 100% and GUI freeze. After restart program/OS, GUI works for few seconds (3-5) and freeze again. I've try to run program with --headless option but still it consume 100% CPU. I've delete cache directory and it didn't fix a problem.

Thunderbird full-version: Thunderbird 115.5.0 20231120220011 20231120220011 OS: openSUSE Leap 15.5 KDE Plasma: 5.27.9 KDE Frameworks: 5.103.0 Kernel: 5.14.21-150500.55.36-default (64-bit)
creator: damian15

title: Thunderbird 115
content:
Today both our email accounts stopped working. One is a gmail account and one is from plusnet. Both accounts worked yesterday. I have made no changes or altered anything on the machine or Thunderbird. I have found that a TB 115 patch was applied at 09:17(UK time) 28 Nov. This correlates to when the problem started. No new emails downloaded. - checked directly with email providers and mails present

Then I received various messages: 1. Cannot authenticate. Shut down TB, rebooted router. then 2. Time out (received from both email servers.) and occasionally exceeded conection limits.

No problems accessing emails via outlook. What is the problem please.

P. New
creator: pinew001

title: Attachement missing
content: When I use a html signature with graphics, the recipients who can not receive Html, do ot receive the grafics, obviously, but also not any other attachment like a PDF file. The same is sent but not received! in other words, our customer complain that we forgot the attachment, but we did not. If I resend without the signature, they receive the PDF file. If I reply with an attachment and have a previous signature with grafics in the feed, the attachement also disapears. The only solution is no grphics in the signature, but that is not a solution, just a quick fix. Thank you very much for your replies.
creator: a.gross3

title: frozen inbox which, unfreezes to download the multiple copies of the same 5 email messages, long since deleted from inbox. This is attempt 15 or so
content: My in box will only download multiple copies of about 5 different emails from October 26 2023. These messages have been deleted lots of times but the inbox will repeatedly repost them as new and not download any new email later than October 26. It is like the movie groundhog day.It reluctantly downloads new email and the gives me up to 20 copies of the same 5 emails, never anything new. Any ideas? I can send emails.Trying the get messages button gives me the wait icon it is processing the new messages. Hours later it is Ground hog day again.The trash has been emptied on each try. I have been able to download new messages with out problems using the Shaw website. I hop this helps, any ideas? Andy
creator: theluckyscot
